list.name: Default

task.summary: begin work on example with balloon attached to chair by string
attach balloon to chair and add upward force to balloon
begin work on experiment with multiple balloons attached to one chair
begin work on experiment with multiple balloons attached to one chair

balloons mounted to chair
This would be the nice way to do it, but there's an issue. The chair rises much slower than the balloon, presumably because of some sort of scaling issue that results from them not being mounted to the same parent.
attach balloons and they spread out nicely (w/o gravity or bouyancy)

begin experiment where user saves falling chair with balloons
Copied from chair_lift
clicking on chair now adds balloon
